New Records: Mohammad Rizwan scored 131* with 121 balls faced and took 3 catches, named Player of the Match.
Pakistan achieved 345/4 in their innings, their highest score in the match.
Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 6 wickets with 10 balls remaining.
The match flow included significant wicket falls and key partnerships.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mohammad Rizwan was named Player of the Match.
The match was the 8th of the series.
